documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Aegis Authenticator A secure OTP app for Android Privacy Policy

Aegis Authenticator does not collect any data from your mobile device.

  • Camera access is only used for scanning OTP QR codes.

If you believe this policy has been violated in any way, please file an issue.

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
points.quoteText: If you believe this policy has been violated in any way, please file an issue.

points.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
points.quoteText: Camera access is only used for scanning OTP QR codes.

points.title: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
points.quoteText: Aegis Authenticator does not collect any data from your mobile device.

points.title: No logs are kept
points.quoteText: Aegis Authenticator does not collect any data from your mobile device

points.title: You are not being tracked
points.quoteText: Aegis Authenticator does not collect any data from your mobile device.

points.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data
points.quoteText: Aegis Authenticator does not collect any data from your mobile device

points.title: The service is open-source
points.status: The source code is available in GitHub

points.title: Features of the service are made available under a free software license
points.status: Aegis is available in the F-Droid store, which is a repository exclusively for apps under free software licenses.
